channel.title: The marvelous 5-star hotel: "Haven Hotel"
channel.description:
Hello,
I am one of the owners of the Haven Hotel. I will use this topic to inform you of changes, prices, etc.
Pictures: The view from outside: [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/245lxk3.png[/img]
The entry hall: [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/bjidzl.png[/img]
1st floor: [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2z3xxjd.png[/img]
2nd floor: [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/ndx5k3.png[/img]
3rd floor: [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/qsksiv.png[/img]
4th floor: [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2cfw2tg.png[/img]
The super suite: [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/28iavli.png[/img]
The roof pool (idea from The akatsuki): [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/16p008.png[/img]
The pricing:
Tiny suite: - Free!
Small 2 Player suite - 20 planks - 1 iron - 5 coal
Normal 2 Player suite - 30 planks - 2 iron - 8 coal
Panoramic suite - 40 planks - 10 raw wood - 3 iron - 10 coal
Small suite - 20 planks - 5 raw wood - 1 iron - 4 coal
Couples suite - 50 planks - 4 iron - 15 coal - 1 gold
Friends suite - 50 planks - 4 iron - 15 coal - 1 gold
Super suite - 128 planks - 10 iron - 40 coal - 2 gold - 1 diamond
The prices are OR prices It's 10 wood OR 1 gold OR 5 coal
If you pay you can stay a whole week and you can only change things in the super suite (like adding furnaces), you may NEVER destroy any hotel property or you will be kicked out with NO refund
Prices for 1 day is the normal price / 5 So yes it's cheaper to buy 1 time for a whole week then to buy each day apart.
You may only go into a rented room if and only if the owner of that room or any hotel staff allows you in.
You may use the hotel pool freely and you may even collect the reed as long as you replant it.
To apply for a staff position post here with this template: [code]IGN: Current home location: how much would you like to get paid: how often do you play: [/code] If you get accepted here i will still ask you some questions in-game
more to come...

item.title: The marvelous 5-star hotel: "Haven Hotel"
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:9, topic:380267”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=476101.msg3481932#msg3481932 date=1296244576]

Thanks for the credits.

Looks nice as always.
Although the idea of a hotel is that there are already rooms inside.
[/quote]there are…

Sorry I mean like beds n shit.[/quote]some rooms even have bookcases, just the super suite isen’t finished

Read full topic

item.title: The marvelous 5-star hotel: "Haven Hotel"
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:5, topic:380267”]whatthe, remember, take my master suite idea into consideration :D[/quote]i will, it will have 2 floors!

Moparisthebest:

While I think the roof pool is a cool idea, a basement pool would be less likely to flood your entire hotel out.

This happened already so yes i will take this in consideration
and the idea is prom reyx7 as i stated.

[quote=“ranger squad, post:2, topic:380267”]Wow, I’ve never really explored the hotel and I have to say IT IS AMAZING! Congratulations to all the builders![/quote]Thank you

Read full topic
